title: Starter
description: If you are an individual player making a few deals per week as a hobby and for some extra income, the Starter plan is for you.

title: Epic Plan
description: If you are a PRO player who has turned your gaming activity into a full-time job and are interested in a high volume of deals, the Epic plan will be the best choice.

title: Legendary Plan
description: If you represent a group or guild, engage in professional-level trading in games, and want access to all deals, you should definitely choose the Legendary plan.
